pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is a script that builds a Gentoo Linux EFI stub kernel which is suitable for booting from a USB key using UEFI (no additional bootloader required). It makes use of the initramfs creation tools (and early userspace init) provided by sys-kernel/genkernel-next.
LVM-over-(dual-factor)LUKS, secure boot and plymouth are supported.

use.flag: Enables support for sys-boot/plymouth in the initramfs (but does not mandate its use).
